last_episode_to_air.name: Some Days Are Victories
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mackenzie gets a dream proposal. Jenelle moves to Vegas; but will Kaiser get a visit with Nathan? Ashley starts her hot girl summer; a visit from Bar leads to his arrest. Cate copes with not visiting Carly.

name: Teen Mom: The Next Chapter
overview: The casts of Teen Mom OG and Teen Mom 2 are each currently in different stages of motherhood - some have kids in diapers, while others are now parenting teenagers! But they all share the unique experience of momming so young. For the first time, the moms and all their stories will be brought together in one supersized series that focuses on the unique bond this "Mom Group" shares as they face the reality of parenthood and adulting while entering this next phase of life together.
tagline: One mother of a supersized new series.

episodes.name: Wishful Thinking
episodes.overview: Amber, Catelynn, Maci, Cheyenne, Leah, Briana, Ashley, & Jade all come together and start a Group chat to stay in touch. Briana wins the lawsuit against a former Teen Mom 2 cast member.

episodes.name: You Go Do You
episodes.overview: Catelynn's anxiety rises when she notices her daughter's head is flat on one side. Jade is nervous to meet Jenelle while Sean shops for an engagement ring. Briana's stress puts a toll on her mental health.

episodes.name: Give Yourself A Little Slack
episodes.overview: Briana plans a trip to see her estranged father. Cheyenne struggles with the aftermath of the shooting incident. Maci celebrates Bentley's 13th birthday and fears the bowling alley will trigger her PTSD. Catelynn has surgery to remove a cyst.

episodes.name: Your Body Your Choice
episodes.overview: Leah moves into her new house and is open to having a baby with Jaylan. Cheyenne & Zach decide they need a fresh start and look for a new house. Briana celebrates Stella's graduation and gets Cheyenne’s advice on co-parenting when Luis doesn’t show up.

episodes.name: Make Good Choices
episodes.overview: Cheyenne supports Cory as his daughter is born with a heart condition. Amber is officially done with her probation. Bentley wants social media but Maci worries about online predators. Briana gets a mental health diagnosis. Catelynn sets new boundaries.

episodes.name: Teen Mom Sisters for Life
episodes.overview: Catelynn invites all the moms to go on a glamping trip in Florida to celebrate Amber’s birthday. Maci & Catelynn are surprised when Ashley doesn’t join. Amber has a great time but the verdict of her custody case is still looming.

episodes.name: I'm Tired But I'm Fired Up
episodes.overview: After Roe v. Wade is overturned, Maci talks to Taylor about getting a vasectomy. Ashley wants to go to nursing school in Vegas but fears the environment will be tough on Bar's sobriety. Catelynn is shocked when she finds out who Briana is dating.

episodes.name: Welcome to Adulthood
episodes.overview: Sean plans a weekend that will change Jade's life forever. Catelynn worries Vaeda has hearing issues while Briana decides it’s time to move out of her moms house. The whole cast is in shock when Amber loses the custody battle for her son James.

episodes.name: You Guys Mated
episodes.overview: In light of the shootings in Uvalde, Maci talks to her kids about gun violence. Leah is ready to “plan” a pregnancy. Ashley, Bar & Holly move to Nevada. Catelynn is in shock when she has ot explain to Nova why she placed Carly up for adoption.

episodes.name: Co-Parenting Rocks
episodes.overview: Catelynn is hospitalized so Tyler is left juggling the kids. Amber is shocked with the state Andrew left her house. Jade is emotional on Kloie's first day of school. Cheyenne finds out Cory will be out of town & won’t be able to help like he promised.

episodes.name: You’re His Keeper
episodes.overview: Briana's boyfriend Bobby visits. Leah talks to her daughters about ways to be proactive since Roe vs Wade was overturned. Maci tries to educate her kids about anti-racism. Cheyenne is frustrated when Zach's learns he may go to jail.

episodes.name: Beautiful Chaos
episodes.overview: Amber goes to California to visit her son James. Sean feels pressure to get a job after looking at a wedding venue with Jade. Cheyenne tries to enjoy her bridal shower. Catelynn & Tyler celebrate 16 years together. Jaylan buys a ring to propose to Leah.

episodes.name: Pumping The Breaks
episodes.overview: Briana breaks up with beau Bobby. Amber struggles with her new visitation schedule for her son. Cheyenne plans a romantic date with Zach before their wedding. Tyler seeks therapy to help him deal with sexual abuse he experienced as a child.

episodes.name: Admit What You Have Done
episodes.overview: Cheyenne realizes she forgot to buy Zach a ring with only days to spare before their wedding. Briana meets with Devoin’s mom to discuss his gambling addiction. Jade extends an olive branch to her mother. Jaylan proposes to Leah in Costa Rica.

episodes.name: Patient Love
episodes.overview: Cheyenne throws her dream wedding. A car accident puts Ashley's & Holly's life at risk. Briana gets stuck in Florida when Hurricane Ian derails her plans to travel to the wedding. Jaylan & Leah are not as happy as they should be after getting engaged.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Emotions run high when Briana declines to sit with the rest of the moms on stage. Jade & Sean are happier than ever. Cheyenne & Zach give an update on his court proceedings. Dr. Drew encourages Devoin to get help for his gambling addiction.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: Leah discusses why she broke off her engagement; Amber expresses her anger at the court's custody decision; Cate details how she feels about her open adoption; Ashley and Bar explain his warrant that escalated to extradition.

episodes.name: Who Raised You
episodes.overview: Cate and Ty buy a new house, Jade shops for wedding dresses, Bri discovers Devoin’s romantic feelings, Maci extends an olive branch to Ryan, and Chey supports Cory and Taylor during their daughter's heart surgery.

episodes.name: Shooting Your Shot
episodes.overview: Leah discovers her Ex-fiancé duped her, while Brianna goes on a date with Devoin. Ashley fears Bar will land back in jail. Cheyenne supports Cory, who receives disappointing news, and Jade's anxiety peaks while wedding planning.

episodes.name: Blood Moon
episodes.overview: Catelynn and Tyler move into their new home, Maci tackles a health issue, Briana is emotionally drained from dealing with Devoin and Luis. Ashley grieves the loss of her brother and Leah considers rebuilding a relationship with her estranged father.

episodes.name: Strength Is A Mentality
episodes.overview: Cheyenne supports Cory as his daughter undergoes open heart surgery. Catelynn & Tyler have a parenting challenge to overcome. Ashley shops for wedding dresses. Leah’s daughter opens up about her muscular dystrophy. Maci seeks advice from Catelynn & Tyler.

episodes.name: Playing With Fire
episodes.overview: Jade and Cheyenne visit Briana in Florida and all eyes are on her and Devoin’s relationship. The moms let loose in a game of truth or dare, but drama between Ashley and Cheyenne takes center stage. Ryan tells Maci he is getting a divorce.

episodes.name: No White Flags
episodes.overview: Catelynn is heartbroken when her family attacks her on social media. Sean plans a surprise for Jade. Zach meets with Bar to discuss the beef between Cheyenne and Ashley. Maci is trying to be there for Ryan but things take a turn when he gets arrested.

episodes.name: You Know The Stakes
episodes.overview: Briana has a medical scare when she finds a suspicious lump in her underarm. Leah tries to help her dad find a rehab. Ashley is frustrated with Bar who didn’t get his community service paperwork completed before his court date.

episodes.name: Tired Of Playing Mama
episodes.overview: Amber and Gary decide what precautions to take so their teenage daughter doesn’t follow in their footsteps. Maci meets up with Ryan after he’s released from jail while Jade attends a support group for family members of addicts.

episodes.name: Six is a Vibe
episodes.overview: Cheyenne throws a groovy themed birthday party for Ryder and Jade and Briana come to Los Angeles to celebrate! Jade struggles to decide if she should visit her parents in rehab and Cory breaks Ryder’s heart when he leaves to compete on The Challenge.

episodes.name: Unbreakable
episodes.overview: Ashley is left alone to care for Holly in Nevada when Bar learns he must serve two years of probation in California; Catelynn supports Tyler as he works on overcoming his childhood trauma; Leah and her daughters participate in a pride parade.

episodes.name: My Biggest Heartbreak
episodes.overview: Jade visits her mom in rehab and worries about her commitment to staying sober; Ryder has a difficult time with Cory away competing on The Challenge so Cheyenne encourages her to talk to him about it.

episodes.name: Hurt People, Hurt People
episodes.overview: Catelynn supports Tyler tackle the next step of his healing journey with a visit to the trailer he grew up in; Jade visits her dad in rehab; with Ryan in jail, Maci follows through on her promise to change.

episodes.name: I Don't Want To Be A Victim
episodes.overview: Catelynn & Tyler are ecstatic when they find out they can see Carly, whom they placed for adoption 14 years ago, but family drama puts the visit on shaky ground. Leah revels in a new-found confidence following a pole fitness class.

episodes.name: High Hopes, Low Expectations
episodes.overview: Catelynn and Tyler visit their daughter Carly who they placed for adoption 14 years ago but the visit takes a drastic turn.

episodes.name: Love Doesn’t Go Away
episodes.overview: Briana confronts Devoin after a shocking discovery that he is gambling again and fears he won’t be able to support Nova.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: The moms dive into the biggest moments of the season. Which couples are still together? Who’s still navigating toxic family drama? Are the moms ready to move forward after years of tension? Find out on Teen Mom: The Next Chapter reunion.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: The emotional reunion continues in part two as more moms join Nessa and Dr. Drew. Are Briana and Devoin pursuing a relationship? What’s the update on Amber’s custody battle? Catelyn gives us the latest on the toxic fallout with her family.

episodes.name: Till Death Do Us Part
episodes.overview: The moms come together to celebrate and cut loose at Jade and Sean's wedding; Cheyenne and Zach clash over having another baby.

episodes.name: Maybe This Is the Gary for You
episodes.overview: Mackenzie is on a new adventure with her boyfriend, Khesanio; Amber surprises the moms with her new boyfriend; Cheyenne sees a fertility doctor; Cate keeps her daughters from her mom.

episodes.name: Milk Duds, a Ring and a Baby
episodes.overview: Leah's ex Jeremy harasses her at work; Jade and Sean's newlywed bliss ends as they homeschool Kloie; Amber questions her future with Leah; Mackenzie and Khesanio celebrate their anniversary.

episodes.name: Get Me off This Rollercoaster
episodes.overview: Jade and Sean's newlywed bliss ends as they homeschool Kloie; Maci gives Bentley his first driving lesson; Cheyenne & Cory clash over holiday plans; Leah finds her dad a treatment center.

episodes.name: Pinky Of A Promise
episodes.overview: Mackenzie plans to grow her family with Khesanio. Briana threatens to keep her kids from Roxanne. Ashley enrolls Holly in swim lessons. Cate attempts therapy with April. Amber fears her mental health struggles will jeopardize her new relationship.

episodes.name: Viva Las Vegas
episodes.overview: Catelynn and Tyler test Vaeda for an Individualized Education Program; Khesanio's mom meets Mackenzie's kids; Jade finds a private school for Kloie while Briana seeks help through Al-anon; in Las Vegas, Jenelle strikes a deal with a cannabis company.

episodes.name: What Are We Gonna Do About Him?
episodes.overview: For the first time, the Dads go on a guys only ski trip to Michigan; Gary reveals a shocking secret that sends the cast into a spiral; Briana and Devoin clash over the girls' commute to school.

episodes.name: Don't Test Me
episodes.overview: Maci gets an unexpected job offer; Jenelle and August's relationship takes a turn; Cheyenne and Cory learn how to discuss racism with Ryder; Jade encourages Sean to find a career; Leah is at odds with Jeremy.

episodes.name: A Toxic Triangle
episodes.overview: Leah discusses sex education with her girls; Maci meets Ryan's girlfriend; Tyler takes Nova to a daddy-daughter dance; Mackenzie fears IVF will affect her mental health; Brianna discovers Roxanne has been lying about her progress.

episodes.name: My Past Is Whooping My Ass
episodes.overview: Leah and the twins meet with their local State Representative; Jade visits Cheyenne in California and questions having another baby; Cheyenne and Zach are at odds as he hasn't found a career; Khesanio asks Brad for his permission to marry Mackenzie.

episodes.name: Pursue You
episodes.overview: Cheyenne visits Taylor in Seattle with the kids just as Cory leaves to compete in The Challenge. Brianna's mother comes home after undergoing treatment. Leah tries to coax her daughter Ali to use a wheelchair.

episodes.name: One Big Happy Family
episodes.overview: Briana arranges a family photograph, forcing Roxanne and Brittany to meet face-to-face. Maci and Cate visit Amber in Indiana to discuss Leah's desire to be adopted by Kristina, but a stunning proposal forces a change of plans.

episodes.name: Don't Get Your Hopes Up
episodes.overview: Amber tells Leah about her engagement; Maci organizes a family BBQ to celebrate Ryan's first year of sobriety; Mackenzie prepares for egg retrieval; Jade's mother gets out of jail.

episodes.name: What’s Your Excuse Now
episodes.overview: Ashley files for joint custody of Holly, Leah lets her father see her daughters, and Briana is shocked for Nova as Devoin moves out of state. Meanwhile, Cheyenne's dad asks Zach to take over the family business, and Gary draws boundaries.

episodes.name: Some Days Are Victories
episodes.overview: Mackenzie gets a dream proposal. Jenelle moves to Vegas; but will Kaiser get a visit with Nathan? Ashley starts her hot girl summer; a visit from Bar leads to his arrest. Cate copes with not visiting Carly.
